item.title: Learn python through pym 10-08-2019
item.description: Day 1 Installing python one can install python using package manager depending upon the operating system you are using. As I have a windows machine and unbuntu using linux on windows subsystem. I can install python from https://python.org. And Ubuntu I can use below command to install python. 1 sudo apt-get install python3 Running python To run python you would call python3 which open Python interpreter. On that you can type print(“Hello World”) to run your first python code which would print Hello World in next line.
